body: Hi Mostapha and hi all, I can't visualize weather data from .epw file generated by CC World Weather File Generator_UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHEMPTON, here below the component error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0TKufB2Qq6PZJq-ZeNYaNrLhhEWo1DsLatvi9lU981mehui-yuST44GTQH8BGO3kA0yC95xn1612NCuGTyMlpW2/Catturadischermata6.png)Maybe the issue was generated by tool conversion, but it seems to be strange because when i put the same file into ECOtect Weather Tool i can run weather data graphs, like this one: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0QRC8fsa-zXSP8ZRyEdt-Zm*SdCmMMxDKuD-FCr1qLiqPtEJKBmXTh52HJVNns3sLDQsDugOKwiKyXndSQ38MGw/Cattura.PNG)I hope you can help me. Thank you in advance. (i attached my epw file, by Notepad++ i noticed too many "question marks")
topic: Impossible to visualize weather data from .epw IPCC scenario A2
